titleStmt.title: The declaracio[n] made at Poules Crosse in the cytye of London the fourth Sonday of Aduent by Alexander Seyton and Mayster Willyam Tolwyn, persone of S. Anthonynes in the sayd cytye of London, the yere of our Lord God M.D.XLJ.
titleStmt.author: Seton, Alexander, d. 1542.
Tolwyn, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London in Saynt Sepulchres paryshe in the Olde Bayly by Rychard Lant,

notesStmt.note: Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.

place.placeName: London in Saynt Sepulchres paryshe in the Olde Bayly
